channel.title: Hidalgo County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Hidalgo County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NM-90 East
item.description: NM-90 east in Hidalgo County.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 20
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 20 - BL-10/West Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22 - NM-494/Main St.

item.title: I-10 West Approaching Exit 22
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 22. Use Exit 22 for Silver City (via NM-90) and Globe, AZ (via US-70).

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 24
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 24 - BL-10/US-70/East Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 West - Exit 29
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 29.

item.title: I-10 West - Hidalgo County Line
item.description: Hidalgo County Line on I-10 west. Hidalgo County is the in the southwest corner of New Mexico.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East at Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-90 East at US-70/NM-90 split. Use US-70 west for Duncan(AZ) and Globe(AZ). Use NM-90 for Silver City.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East Approaching Split
item.description: US-70 West/NM-East approaching US-70/NM-90 Split.

item.title: US-70 West/NM-90 East
item.description: US-70 West/NM-90 east in Lordsburg.

item.title: BL-10 East at US-70/NM-90
item.description: BL-10 east at US-70/NM-90 to Duncan (AZ) and Silver City.

item.title: BL-10 West at I-10 East to Deming
item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 east to Deming.

item.title: Rest Area Access Road at BL-10
item.description: New Mexico Rest Area access road at BL-10. Turn right for I-10 East to Deming. Turn left for BL-10 east into Lordsburg.

item.title: BL-10 West at I-10
item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 West. Head over the overpass for I-10 east.

item.title: BL-10 West Approaching I-10
item.description: BL-10 west approaching I-10. Use I-10 west for Tucson. Use I-10 east for Deming.

item.title: NM-494 North at US-70/BL-10/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at US-70/BL-10/NM-90. US-70/NM-90 split off BL-10 here towards Silver City.

item.title: NM-494 North at BL-10/US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at BL-10/US-70 and NM-90.

item.title: NM-494 North Approaching BL-10/US-70
item.description: NM-494 north approaching BL-10 and US-70.

item.title: NM-494 North To US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north to US-70/NM-90 in Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 22 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 offramp at NM-494 junction. Use NM-494 north for BL-10/US-70/NM-90.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 - NM-494/Main St.

item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 22
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 22. Use Exit 22 for Silver City (via NM-90) and Globe, AZ (via US-70).

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 20B
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 20B - BL-10/Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 20A
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 20A - New Mexico Information Center/Rest Area. Speed limit drops from 75 MPH to 65 MPH as I-10 enters Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East - Exits 20A-B
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exits 20AB - BL-10/Rest Area/Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 East - Lordsburg Exits
item.description: Lordsburg Exits on I-10 East - W. Motel Drive, Main St., and E. Motel Drive.

item.title: I-10 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-10 east to Lordsburg, Deming, and Las Cruces. The control city in western New Mexico along I-10 is Las Cruces. In Arizona the control city is El Paso.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 15 - Gary.

item.title: NM-338 North at I-10 Onramp
item.description: NM-338 north at I-10. Use I-10 west for Road Forks. Use I-10 east for Lordsburg.

item.title: NM-338 North at I-10
item.description: NM-338 north at I-10. NM-338 north ends here.

item.title: NM-338 South
item.description: NM-338 south. In the background there is a distance marker to Cotton City, Animas, and Playas.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 11 - NM-338 South/Animas.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 5
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 5 - NM-80 South/Road Forks.

item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 5
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 5. Use NM-80 south for Douglas, AZ and Agua Prieta, Mexico.

item.title: I-10 Onramp at Exit 3
item.description: I-10 onramp at Exit 3. One of the I-10 shields as the state name in it.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 3 offramp. Turn left for Steins. Continue ahead for I-10 east to Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 3 - Steins. This is the first exit in New Mexico along I-10.

item.title: I-10 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-10 east. Distance to Steins, NM-80, and Lordsburg. This is the first distance marker along I-10 in New Mexico.

item.title: I-10 East - Welcome To New Mexico
item.description: Welcome to New Mexico on I-10 east. Taken at the Arizona-New Mexico State Line.
